1.text: These are the mansions of the children of Israel, who went out of Egypt by their troops under the conduct of Moses and Aaron,

2.text: Which Moses wrote down according to the places of their encamping, which they changed by the commandment of the Lord.

3.text: Now the children of Israel departed from Ramesses the first month, on the fifteenth day of the first month, the day after the phase, with a mighty hand, in the eight of all the Egyptians,

4.text: Who were burying their firstborn, whom the Lord had slain (upon their gods also he had executed vengeance,)

6.text: And from Soccoth they came into Etham, which is in the uttermost borders of the wilderness.

7.text: Departing from thence they came over against Phihahiroth, which looketh towards Beelsephon, and they camped before Magdalum.

8.text: And departing from Phihahiroth, they passed through the midst of the sea into the wilderness: and having marched three days through the desert of Etham, they camped in Mara.

9.text: And departing from Mara, they came into Elim, where there were twelve fountains of waters, and seventy palm trees: and there they camped.

10.text: But departing from thence also, they pitched their tents by the Red Sea. And departing from the Red Sea,

11.text: They camped in the desert of Sin.

12.text: And they removed from thence, and came to Daphca.

13.text: And departing from Daphca, they camped in Alus.

14.text: And departing from Alus, they pitched their tents in Raphidim, where the people wanted water to drink.

15.text: And departing from Raphidim, they camped in the desert of Sinai.

16.text: But departing also from the desert of Sinai, they came to the graves of lust.

17.text: And departing from the graves of lust, they camped in Haseroth.

18.text: And from Haseroth they came to Rethma.

19.text: And departing from Rethma, they camped in Remmomphares.

20.text: And they departed from thence and came to Lebna.

21.text: Removing from Lebna they camped in Ressa.

22.text: And departing from Ressa, they came to Ceelatha.

23.text: And they removed from thence and camped in the mountain Sepher.

24.text: Departing from the mountain Sepher, they came to Arada.

25.text: From thence they went and camped in Maceloth.

26.text: And departing from Maceloth, they came to Thahath.

27.text: Removing from Thahath they camped in Thare.

28.text: And they departed from thence, and pitched their tents in Methca.

29.text: And removing from Methca, they camped in Hesmona.

30.text: And departing from Hesmona, they came to Moseroth.

31.text: And removing from Moseroth, they camped in Benejaacan.

32.text: And departing from Benejaacan, they came to mount Gadgad.

33.text: From thence they went and camped in Jetebatha.

34.text: And from Jetebatha they came to Hebrona.

35.text: And departing from Hebrona, they camped in Asiongaber.

36.text: They removed from thence and came into the desert of Sin, which is Cades.

37.text: And departing from Cades, they camped in mount Her, in the uttermost borders of the land of Edom.

38.text: And Aaron the priest went up into mount Hor at the commandment of the Lord: and there he died in the fortieth year of the coming forth of the children of Israel out of Egypt, W the fifth month, the first day of the month,

39.text: When he was a hundred and twenty-three years old.

40.text: And king Arad the Chanaanite, who dwelt towards the south, heard that the children of Israel were come to the land of Chanaan.

41.text: And they departed from mount Her, and camped in Salmona.

42.text: From whence they removed and came to Phunon.

43.text: And departing from Phunon, they camped in Oboth.

44.text: And from Oboth they came to Ijeabarim, which is in the borders of the Moabites.

45.text: And departing from Ijeabarim they pitched their tents in Dibongab.

46.text: From thence they went and camped in Helmondeblathaim.

47.text: And departing from Helmondeblathaim, they came to the mountains of Abarim over against Nabo.

48.text: And departing from the mountains of Abarim, they passed to the plains of Moab, by the Jordan, over against Jericho.

49.text: And there they camped from Bethsi moth even to Ablesatim in the plains of the Moabites,

50.text: Where the Lord said to Moses:

51.text: Command the children of Israel, and say to them: When you shall have passed over the Jordan, entering into the land of Chanaan,

52.text: Destroy all the inhabitants of that land: beat down their pillars, and break in pieces their statues, and waste all their high places,

53.text: Cleansing the land, and dwelling in it. For I have given it you for a possession.

54.text: And you shall divide it among you by lot. To the more you shall give a larger part, and to the fewer a lesser. To every one as the lot shall fall, so shall the inheritance be given. The possession shall be divided by the tribes and the families.

55.text: But if you will not kill the inhabitants of the land: they that remain, shall be unto you as nails in your eyes, and spears in your sides, and they shall be your adversaries in the land of your habitation.

56.text: And whatsoever I had thought to do to them, I will do to you.
